text: Eldon Rasmussen (7 July 1936 – 5 June 2022) Indianapolis 500 Veteran Rasmussen Dies at 85 was a Canadian racecar driver. He raced in the USAC Championship Car series. He raced in the 1971 and 1973–1979 seasons, including the 1975, 1977, and 1979 Indianapolis 500. Rasmussen was born in Edmonton, Alberta. He was honored into the Canadian Motorsport Hall of Fame. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Canadian racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from Edmonton
title: Eldon Rasmussen
